body_html: The approach looks interesting. One area that you probably need to pay some attention to is stateful ops. One good test is to replace all the conds in third_party/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/control_flow_ops_py_test.py with yours and make sure all the tests still pass.
body_text: The approach looks interesting. One area that you probably need to pay some attention to is stateful ops. One good test is to replace all the conds in third_party/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/control_flow_ops_py_test.py with yours and make sure all the tests still pass.
body: The approach looks interesting. One area that you probably need to pay some attention to is stateful ops. One good test is to replace all the conds in third_party/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/control_flow_ops_py_test.py with yours and make sure all the tests still pass.
